p: Differential expression analysis was performed by analysis of variance (ANOVA) and Tukey's HSD test with Benjamini‐Hochberg post‐hoc corrections (Benjamini and Hochberg, 1995) within the XLSTAT‐Premium Version 2016.1 (Addinsoft) ‘OMICs’ package. All proteins significantly ( P < 0.05) up‐regulated during growth on hydrocarbons were subjected to a BLAST (Basic Local Alignment Search Tool) (Altschul et al., 1990) against the NCBI nr database. Protein family and domain analysis was carried out in Pfam v30.0 (Finn et al., 2016). Proteins were assigned to functional families by hierarchical classification of protein domains based on their folding patterns in CATH v4.1 (Class, Architecture, Topology, Homology) (Sillitoe et al., 2015). Full length secondary and tertiary structure predictions, functional annotations on ligand‐binding sites, enzyme commission numbers and gene ontology terms were generated using the I‐TASSER SERVER (Zhang, 2008).
